attributes.action: force holders of Mail Delivery Licences to collect and deliver themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Postcomm are charged with openning up the market to competion. Collecting from Business's and passing it to Royal Mail to deliver, is not competion. 

It is a loophole being abused. 

Mail license holders that do not wish to collect and deliver their own mail should be removed. So, that only those serious enough to make a full delivey service nationwide be allowed to hold a licence.
